name: Eye Color Quad Crème Eyeshadow Palette

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These are gorgeous eye shadows. The pigment is amazing. The colors are usable and beautiful. They’re pricey. I hate Tom Ford for that, but at the end of the day, his are the best makeup products on the market.  I also love his eye liner and his lipsticks are my favorite lipsticks I’ve ever had.

reviews.review_title: Tom Ford Eyeshadow Palette Not Worth The Prize
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color but the colors transfer and smudge even if you use a primer. Absolutely not worth that prize even with a discount of 20 %.

reviews.review_title: A bit too powdery than the wet-dry formula
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It is a bit more powdery than I expected and some powder got into my eyes, both times. Surprisingly though they didn’t cause any irritation to my eyes. However, I feel that the colours are a bit too dark for me. So, I wouldn’t say I love it yet!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve always wanted to try a Tom Ford Quad and decided that this past sale would be the best chance. Now it’s pretty, and the shadows don’t seem to crease and have long wear, but I guess I just wasn’t wowed. I want to be wowed when I spend this much money on a makeup item. Still, it’s a beautiful palette but I wouldn’t  pay full price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: There is something very special about this formula. It melts into the skin and reflects light in the most flattering way. It’s easy to use with intuitive color stories. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Tom Ford 40 Golden Hour Eye quad!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from influencer for my honest opinion and incentive, I felt that the eyeshadow was very velvety I wore it to a party 3 hours later I looked in the mirror where did my makeup go I swear I put it on!!!! Didn't last at all, so glad I did not spend my hard earned money on this,yet it's beautiful when it does stay!!! I love all Tom Ford fragrances this is my first time trying anything from there Beauty line!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the most gorgeous green colors I've ever used. The product is rich in color and creamy in texture. I'm a ginger, so these colors complement my skin tone so well. A little bit of product has an insane amount of pigment and glides of the skin beautifully. Normally, I would say that $90 for an eyeshadow palette is ridiculous, but for this one I can justify it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Over rated, I thought these would be rich purple colors but they come out reddish.

reviews.review_title: Why did I wait so long?!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Why did I wait so long? Easy answer - the price, for a quad. If you can make peace with the price, the product itself is beautiful. Classically elegant. As an all matte crème quad is provides the  versatility of being able to be worn on its own, or as a foundation for powder shadows.

reviews.review_title: Not worth it  don’t waste your money
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No eye shadow is worth $90. Stop letting them just take your money!! Also I haven’t found Tom ford products to be great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this after watching many YouTube videos rave about it. It is an outstanding palette, the cream texture is like nothing else I’ve ever tried. The price is insane but actually worth it. I hope they come out with more shades

reviews.review_title: Shrunken products, fell out of pans
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First let me say it pains me to write this. I LOVE TOM FORD products but this was a huge miss for me. I ordered two of these, one in Smoky Quartz and one in Rose Topaz.  Smoky Quartz -- when first opening I thought it was used. I've had issues in the past with Sephora sending me used stuff. However, upon lifting up the plastic cover three of the 4 shades were separated from the sides of their pans and fell out immediately. It created a huge mess. So disappointing. I don't know if this was due to improper storage or a manufacturing issue. Might be a one off, but I have a feeling this separation issue might happen to all of them eventually. It reminded me of the Chanel's potted cream eyeshadows which would shrink and fall out of the pots.   Rose Topaz -- two of the shades were basically glitter bombs with little to no pigment, not my thing and I usually love Tom Ford's glittery eyeshadows. Yes, the shades are light, but the underlying pigment was patchy and it was mostly chunky glitter which I'd attribute to cheaper brands.  The formula is unique and a nice hybrid between cream and powder eyeshadow but it needs to go back to the drawing board. I sent both back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: *I used my Rouge Reward to get Violet Satine from Sephora and Nordy Notes to get Velours Kaki. I try to use rewards, points, notes to get splurge items for myself, as a special treat!  Both of these quads are absolutely terrific. I am used to TF wet/dry and regular formula quads, so there was a small, yet brief learning curve to using the crème shadow formula. These shadows are extremely pigmented. As someone who normally prefers to build up eye shadows (and other products), I found that a light hand, as well as a fluffier brush to start at least, seem to work best for me with these quads.  Violet Satine is a little more straight forward with regards to application and shadow placement. The undertones are different from other purple palettes that I own, and this quad looks gorgeous on the eye.  I was excited to see a TF green quad, and I love that it's mostly grungy, moody greens. I wasn't quite sure if the quad was going to be too dark overall, or if I'd like that the lightest shade was not only, not very light (I'm super pale), but is matte and not a shimmer (or even a satin). I'm happy to say that I'm surprisingly not mad at that light beige-y matte! It's light and brightening enough for my inner lid (especially if a bit extra is pressed on with a finger) on its own. Also, I found that my Viseart Paris Nudes contains a few shades (within the top row) that complement this quad perfectly for an inner corner highlight, and to add a subtle shimmer if I want, without changing the color laid down by the matte beige. It's a great match.  One thing to note (thanks to watching a few YouTube demos and reviews); the matte racing car green is actually lighter than the shade next to it, despite appearing darker in the pan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought Violet Satine as soon as it launched and have been loving it.  Cool toned purples are notoriously difficult to formulate but these are beautiful.  The mattes are pigmented, buildable and blend seamlessly using natural hair brushes. The shimmers apply best with a finger but a softer look can be achieved with a brush.  I can't recommend this quad enough and hope TF keeps it as part of the permanent line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This amazes me every time I use it I get reminded of how easily these blend. These blend better than anything els in my collecting and that includes powder formulas. They are expensive but worth it in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first Tom ford quad and I am not disappointed these blend flawlessly !!! Im so glad I picked this up. It’s expensive but when you get daily use from something like this it’s worth it to me.  The colours are perfect for neutral lovers

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: TF quads are so expensive but the formula is the best, especially for a person that wants a no fuss application. I don't like having to do a lot when applying makeup, so I only go for effortless products and TF quads are buttery smooth, pigmented, and last. I honestly bought this one only for the caramel shade which is a perfect all over lid shade for me. I generally prefer the wet/dry formula but the new formula with these quads are just as good. I'm happy they're no longer limited addition as I will continue to purchase Tiger Eye because I like the caramel shade so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loves these,  I loved this so much I bought the smokey quartz as well. they are buttery and smooth and last all day with a eyeshadow primer. my fav is the quartz cuz I'm a mattes gal. waiting for the 3rd to come back in stock to purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It was amazing! The colors themselves required very little application to get very heavy pigmentation. The colors are very neutral. For the price tag, I am glad it’s 5 stars. I received this free from influenster for review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to receive the Tom Ford palette!!! The colors in this are absolutely amazing!!! The eyeshadow went on smoothly and looked so good with my hazel eyes. Yes I definitely recommend this palette to others. Y'all won't be disappointed!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very well pigmented shadows! I love the applicator since it has a brush end. It makes using this product on the go very easy. It is very expensive, so had I not received it to test, I probably would not purchase it. There are many other products that perform the same for less!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really really liked this eye shadow.  First it's creamy shades were easy to apply and blend. The colors are beautiful with a slight shimmer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free for testing purposes from Influenster but my opinions are my own! I have heard mixed reviews on this palette but I absolutely love this one! The shadows are soft, blendable, beautiful, and pigmented! I always apply my eyeshadows with a primer and they stay all day! I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous packaging, to start. Feels luxurious.  The shadow colors are stunning. Buttery smooth, highly pigmented, and oh so blendable. The rich colors look amazing, and can achieve a lovely daytime or night out look. Pricey, but high quality!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed using this pallet. I have never owned a pallet that is so creamy and elegant. Good coverage blends well and lasts the majority of the day. I love that there is both matt and shimmer, and the colors are just beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this eyeshadow palette! The texture is silky and glides on like butter, and the pigment is great. I will say I have similar quality eyeshadows at a much cheaper price point, but I still really like this quad!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to receive my first Tom Ford eyeshadow quad! I had never splurged on an eyeshadow this price for only 4 shadows but I've always wanted to try them. The packaging is so luxurious!  It sturdy and comes in a really nice velvet pouch for storage. The shades are perfect for everyday looks. Easy to apply and the formula is really nice. It has a nice wear time and looked beautiful with my blue eye color. I would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product was great! Very creamy shadows and luxurious feeling! They blended out like a dream! I just don’t know if I could ever pay $89 for a name! I’ve used other palletes that were cheaper and performed the same! I received this product free for reviewing purposes from Influenster

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this creamy application! Can be used for a super minimal but gorgeous look or can be darkened up for a more dramatic eye. 10/10 recommended & I’ll be buying the other shades!

reviews.review_title: Gorgeous blendable cream to powder shadow
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best textured eyeshadow formula I've ever tried! It is creamy but not too moist, so it blends like a dream! It is long lasting, and just the right amount of pigment enabling buildable coverage. The packaging is gorgeous but a little tricky to open. I wish the medium shade had less shimmer for use in the crease but other than that its amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this eyeshadow as a complimentary item through Influenster in exchange for my honest review.  The colors on this palette are very complimentary of each other, but they have their own shimmer and aren’t too close in tone like some other brands I’ve tried. It’s easy to apply and doesn’t flake off throughout the day or while you’re applying. I love the little felt bag it comes in, because it keeps it shiny and safe in my ever-messy makeup bag. It also feels like a ritual, pulling it out each time. More than just flipping open a palette and applying. If you’re trying to take time to enjoy little things in this hectic world, try this eyeshadow. Plus it’s Tom Ford, so you know it’s quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this palette!  The shades are wonderful, especially on a my neutral skin tone.  The colors blended very well together.  The texture of the palette is very creamy and dries down very well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this palette from Influenster and Tom Ford in exchange for my honest review. I’ll start with the good - the colors are beautiful. Very warm neutrals that are more nuanced in use than they appear in the pan. The formula is quite nice as well. The shadows are buildable and more forgiving than shadows that hit you with a ton of pigment right away. In my experience, they blended nicely, and lasted for a full day without too  much fading, but I do make it a point to always use a primer due to my oily eyelids.  The packaging is gorgeous! The compact feels weighty in the hand and just looks expensive and luxe…and that brings me to the main con - the price point! I fully understand that Tom Ford is an ultra-luxury brand, however I don’t feel this palette is quite worth the heavy price tag especially when there are other luxury brands offering the same performance at a better value.  Overall, the product is beautiful and if the color story speaks to you and you want to treat yourself it might be worth the splurge…but your bank account is going to feel it the next morning if you know what I mean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the color palette and the durability of the shadows.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been embracing a more minimalist approach to makeup lately and this eyeshadow hits the mark on most of the criteria that I’m looking for.   Pros: - Beautiful and pigmented colors  - Can be used for a daytime or nighttime look - Really smooth application   Cons: - Minor con- lasting power isn’t great on me unless I use an eyeshadow primer but I have oily eyelids and this is true for most eyeshadows.

reviews.review_title: To shimmer or not to shimmer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Received this product from Influenster and Tom Ford in exchange for my honest review of the product. I’m placing it at 3 stars for the performance and overall aesthetic of the packaging which is by far superb…in fact aesthetically it’s ridiculous lol. The product itself contains shimmer earthy/coral tones. Not much fall out and the pay out color is nice. Blends effortlessly and lasts a long time. I’m knocking off stars because the price point is just simply outrageous for a 4 pan shadow! I’ve used plenty of other brands with options of colors and finishes for way less and perform equally if not better. So in my opinion is it worth it…that’s for you to decide but I would not pay the price for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford eye color creme eyeshadow Quad did not disappoint. Each eyeshadow color blended well together & is well pigmented. The color platte is perfect for any occasion. It does a great job staying on and looking great. No need to add layers upon layers it is what you would expect from Tom Ford. Not only is the eyeshadow beautiful but the packaging is as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this palette from Tom Ford. The colors are beautiful and I love the shimmer. My favorite is the warm champagne which compliments my hazel eyes. I see some reviews stating the shadows weren’t long lasting but I used an eyeshadow primer and found it to last as long as I needed. Overall I was very pleased with the palette.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First off I absolutely love the colors and texture of the palette. They feel buttery and soft they also blend beautifully together. However the pigment could stand to be more intense and rich in color. It has more shimmer than color. Great packaging and color range just needs more richness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary but my opinions are all my own. The eyeshadow quad from Tom Ford is a luxurious addition to any makeup lovers collection. The shadows merry together well and go on smooth and creamy . The packaging is stunning and great for travel - the mirror is a nice size to use when applying your makeup on the go. If you can afford a little bit of luxury and find the shadows are a match for your skin tone, I think it’s a nice splurge :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. Here’s my fast take:  Pros: - warm tones  - shimmery  - luxe packaging Cons: - foam applicators - not a “one and done” palette - only shimmery shades - not very long wearing  Here’s the longer version: I was so excited to receive this palette and had very high hopes for it, but as others have mentioned, it falls short. The packaging is so luxurious but whhhhyyyyy add the cheap foam applicators? That totally takes the whole palette down a bit. Personally, I would have preferred a lighter matte shade in this space. I also noticed that the swatches came out so lovely but when I actually went to apply on my eyes the color payoff just wasn’t there. I would definitely not purchase this palette, since I prefer to have all of the shades I need for a look in one place, but I am happy to have it to mix and match with other eyeshadows I already own. Overall, I think there’s other options that give you better bang for your buck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This eye shadow palette feels so luxurious, from the packaging to the quality of the eyeshadow. The colors compliment each other well and are very pigmented. Applies very smoothly and has pretty good lasting power. Would buy the other quads too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful palette. I wish the colors contrasted a bit more so that you could create more combinations. The top right and bottom left colors appeared pretty similar on my tanned skin tone. It is high quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this luxurious eye shadow in the shade Tiger Eye and am so super happy with it! I really like the color selection, the saturated pigmentation and how long lasting it is! I like the glitter components but would have appreciated one neutral, matte color to balance the shimmer tones. The applicators work really well, there’s even a brush! The colors are buttery and creamy and blend really well. Perfect! The quad is beautiful and let my eyes shine but the price is pretty steep and not sure whether it’s really worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a complimentary sample to test and review. Packaging is quite durable and luxe. Unfortunately the metallic chrome finish shows every touch and fingerprint on this palette. Eyeshadows are rich and pigmented. Mostly metallic shimmers. I had to use some matte shades from another palette to complete my look. Didn’t crease as promised.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colors are beautiful and go on well and feel creamy and soft, the only reason why it doesn’t get a 5 star review is because it doesn’t hold very long after a few hours I have noticed the colors have started slipping away. It is hot out and such but I feel like they should have better staying power for the price of the product. Overall though I enjoyed this!

reviews.review_title: Why are they still giving sponge applicators?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow was nice, but for $89, I want something I can do my entire eye with. There was not a light enough shade for highlight, so my look was unfinished. I would have much rather had two more shades (or even just one) instead of two sponge applicators that I’m never going to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this was a nice quad.   The colors are pigmented, buttery, and blended well. After a day of wear it still looked good.  My only criticism of this product was that all 4 shades were shimmers, one matte shade would have helped to balance it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from Influenster to try out and I loved the creaminess of the shadows and how u can go from night to day with this quad. I keep this in my purse to be able to change my look if I have something going on later and don’t have time to go home. I def would purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very pigmented and smooth, I was really impressed with how easily they went and how smooth they blended out. I used the darkest shade as a liner and it worked perfectly. Colors are great for summer and the packaging is really pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Stunning packaging. Shades are extremely pigmented and go on very smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this palette complimentary for review from influenster. It is a beautiful palette with lovely shimmers, but not great for oily eyelids. This quad did not have great staying power for me even with a primer, the formula is also a bit patchy with the darker color. Although the light shimmery champagne is a lovely inner corner highlight. I will most likely just stick to using this palette for highlighting and not as a regular full eyeshadow palette.

reviews.review_title: So smooth Shadows again definitely worth the money
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like theses shadows, the The colors go so well together or on they’re own, It’s good for a easy day look and night out they go on so smooth, and blend really well, I will buy Tom ford Shadows again definitely worth the money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love my Tom Ford Eye Color Crème Eyeshadow Quad in Tiger Eye! I received this product complimentary of Influenster. Everything stated is my honest opinion. The eyeshadows are easy to use, blend nicely, and pigmented. I love using this pallete for a quick all over application. Plus, there is a nice large mirror. On the other hand, the eyeshadow applicators are not necessary and do a mediocre job. I'd recommend using your own brushes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time using a crème eyeshadow and I love it! I’m not a make up pro by any means but this palette made it easier to apply the eyeshadow to my hooded eyes. It has some sheer but is easy to build up. The eyeshadow is very lush and creamy and the colors were shimmery with a subtle neutral tone. It was easy to apply and blend. I used a primer before using the shadow but not even sure I needed to. It doesn’t flake at all and stays where applied. I really enjoyed using this product and would highly recommend. Tom Ford did not disappoint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, this is my favorite eyeshadow. I have  been using Tom Ford eyeshadow for almost five years. It was great then and hasn’t changed. Love the intense pigmentation. It doesn’t crease and lasts a long time. The colors are beautiful. It’s the only eyeshadow I use. I received this product free from Influenster and Tom ford but I purchased the other color I owned and loved it too. It really is the best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample from Influenster. All opinions are my own. This is gorgeous and classy. The colors have incredible payoff and a little bit of product goes a long way. You can do a variety of looks with these depending on how much product you use for different intensities.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! Amazing palette! The colors are very beautiful and pigmented. Works better with a primer. Highly recommend getting it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WOW! This is probably the most luxurious, elegant eyeshadow I've ever owned lol. I love these colors, and the result is incomparable. I wish I had that I had money, like money-MONEY (you know what I'm talking about!)to be able to afford more products from Tom Ford lol. I give this a 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These colors are stunning! It is best to apply the shadow with your fingers instead of the applicators as the pigment shows up better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great eye shadow pallet. I love the colors. They have great pigment and the color lasts all day. This is a great everyday essential pallet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the soft texture of this shadow. Even the darker shades looked good with my skin tone. They blended well but there was a lot of fallout. I just don’t think it’s worth the hefty price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty colors and good pigmentation. Versatile shades that can be used day and night, casual or glam.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colors of this eyeshadow quad are great for everyday use. Day or night. I use the three lightest shades during the day and add the darkest shade for a Smokey eye on an evening out. These eyeshadows are texturally very soft & buttery. I was afraid there'd be a ton of fallout but there was not and they blended very well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product to test. The packaging was perfect! The colors are nice but don't exactly complement my skin tone. They do layer nicely and the pigment is beautiful, this would be a lovely product for someone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow is beautiful! The shades complement my skin tone well (very fair), and are easy to apply. It lasts all day, and is very pigmented without smudging, which I value in an eyeshadow. I love the neutral tones, and you can easily build up one single color or combine colors for more dramatic look. I would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very luxe packaging and component. The palette has great warm tone neutral shades for everyday wear. The colors are creamy and blend well.  I would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got the pleasure of trying this out & I am not typically a neutral palette kind of girl, but these are beautiful. Blend well, creamy, and just enough pigment, in my opinion. I'd say if you have the coin to splurge, do it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this quad eyeshadow to test, first and foremost, the packaging is decadent!  So very fancy!  The colors are beautiful and great for everyday wear!  When applying the shadow there is not a lot of fallout which is nice!  The pigment looks great on the quad, but applying it, it isn’t as pigmented as I would hope.  It layers really well, the only downfall for a pallet of this price, it doesn’t last as long as some of my others.  Usually I don’t have to touch up my shadow at all (with using a primer), with this one, I had creasing after several hours of wear, and transfer.  I had to bust out the quad and touch up.  Otherwise, I really loved it!  The colors are great for everyday use!  Thanks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye shadow is top notch quality, which of course you expect from a luxury brand such as Tom Ford. This applies smoothly and is well pigmented.

reviews.review_title: Super smooth and blend out great
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I will start off by saying that these shadows go on super smoothly and blend out effortlessly. the colors are very muted, but I was able to create a soft, natural look that held up pretty well throughout the day even without an eyeshadow primer. the packaging and case are beautiful, it came with some tiny sponge applicators and a tiny brush which was a little unnecessary. the quality of these shadows were great as I feel most tom ford products are. however, for 4 eyeshadows the price is steep to say the least but again. this is Tom ford.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the formula of this eyeshadow palette. This is my first time trying out a Tom Ford eye product thanks to influenster and so far it's a positive experience and I can tell that this is a high end product. These colors are warm and neutral so they would complement many eye colors and skin tones. I may have to try other colors from this line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow pallette is HIGHLY PIGMENTED which means a little goes a long way. Great colors that are neutral makes me continue my natural look. You cannot go wrong with this pallette at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I can honestly say I've never tried luxury maybe up before, way out of this mammas price range, lol, but thanks to influencer I was able to try this beautiful eyeshadow palette from Tom Ford and I'm just blown away! I guess what they say about you get what you pay for is spot on. From the luxury packaging to the formula this palette is now my favorite. The fall out is minimal at best, the shadows blend flawlessly and the colors compliment anyone skintone. If you want to treat yourself to something luxe definitely give this eyeshadow palette a go you will not be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the best eye shadow I have had! The pigment is GREAT and the colors are perfect!!! It lasts long and goes on easily!! Absolutely love it!!!

reviews.review_title: Not worth the high price tag
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I found out I'd be receiving this palette, I was so excited! I'd never tried out Tom Ford makeup before, and after seeing the retail price for this palette, my expectations were very high! The packaging itself is incredibly beautiful, as are the shadows within. Unfortunately, with the shimmery shadows I was expecting much better payoff. I found myself having to apply several layers to get my preferred look. Truthfully, I have many shimmery shadows in much cheaper palettes that out preform the much too expensive Tom Ford shadows. Due to that I just can't recommend it for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A luxurious palette with four shades that compliment one another for the perfect eye shadow quad. The packaging alone sets this product apart, the gorgeous case and the little bag it comes in. The shadow is rich, creamy and blends perfectly. Overall a splurge but one that won’t disappoint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster to test out, and I am OBSESSED. the shades blend together perfectly to create a gorgeous going-out eye look, and the creamy texture makes it so easy to apply!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time using a Tom Ford makeup product. This eyeshadow palette is fantastic! I absolutely love the colors - perfect for an every day look. The colors are very pigmented and a little goes a long way. The color lasts me all day long and I have quite oily eyelids. I really like this palette and highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't typically go for a cream formula, but this one seems to have much better staying power than other kinds I've tried, I don't get the creases in my lids with this formula. However, WHY must all the shades in the palette be shimmery?! I'm in my mid 30s, I'm not going to the club, give me some subtle and matte shades I can wear to work. Overall, its a nice product, good quality, and a beautiful case, it just isn't for me and my needs or style. App will not let me upload a photo!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to receive this palette for free for my honest review and opinion. I don’t think I’d be able  convince myself to spend this much on four shades. But my review after using these shadows on myself and clients is that they are soo worth every penny. The color payoff is amazing and blendable. I was so excited to receive this palette for free for my honest opinion. I could never convince myself to to spend this much on four shades. The colors I received were stunning! They glide on so effortlessly and blend like a dream. They are all satin/shimmer finish and give this beautiful glow to the eyes, almost like a “wet look”.  My one complaint would be that is like at least one matte shade. All in all, I want to try more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was by first time using anything by Tom Ford. I am very impressed with this product. The eyeshadow was easy to use and blended very well. It didn’t crumble and the colors were not overpowering. They layered really nice. I loved the look I was able to create with this  quad. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These shadows blend like butter ! Such great pigment and easy to blend. The colors are so versatile and great for everyday wear as well as special event looks. The packaging is so sturdy and has great weight, it even comes beautifully wrapped in its own dust bag. I'd highly recommend for all skin types as you can create so many looks with this quad shadow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Overall, I am satisfied with the product though not sure if I would buy again. The eyeshadow is high quality and has a good amount of pigment, but I don’t think the colors are particularly unique. With the high price point, I think there are other Tom Ford products to invest in, or other similar eyeshadow palettes for cheaper with other brands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'd never tried Tom Ford's eyeshadow before this, and I was pretty impressed! The eyeshadow had a very silky texture, and it didn't crumble of flake off when I applied it, which is one of my pet peeves. The colors were also very vibrant and blended well. It's absolutely perfect for smoky eye. I can't speak to the quality of the brushes, as I used my own. But overall, I'm rather pleased with this. I tend to favor bolder colors and brands like Urban Decay, but for a wear-to-work or a formal interview,Tom Ford's palette is a pretty solid bet. And if you like neutrals, you'll probably really love this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried a lot of eye shadow palettes but in the low to mid-budget range. I am generally stick to neutrally colors. So having zero high end eye shadow experience, I was not at all sure what to expect. At first, I was a little both overwhelmed (fancy pouch, finger print magnetic case) and underwhelmed (the little applicators I haven't gotten in years).   But now that I have done a little testing, this is beyond any other palette I have tried before. The shadows are very silky and very pigmented. I put the shadow on both with the included applicators and my tried and true method, my fingers (sorry, never got the hang of brushes). And I am sorry to have been quick to judge the little sponge applicators because they worked very well and I liked the inclusion of a mini brush and pointed sponge.  Overall, a nice little palette for a sparkly look or a no black glam look. I did take a star off only because they are all shimmer shades which makes it a little limiting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford's Eye Color Crème Eyeshadow Quad in the Tiger Eye variety had sleek, elegant packaging. The entire presentation felt very luxurious from the compact eyeshadow design to the small cloth bag it came in. I love that it had a mirror and had room for small eyeshadow applicators for on the go. It even came with two double sided applicators. I love the color palette of the eyeshadow. Three had shimmer to them and the brown was more matte. However, the swatches on my skin don't show up as pronounced even if the pigment looks strong at first. They are very muted or blend into my natural skin color, so at times it doesn't look like I'm wearing eyeshadow. This eyeshadow probably isn't as well suited for my skintone than others, or I may not be applying it as well as I could. I was a bit disappointed that these crème eyeshadows don't have lasting power. After I get home from work every day, I would see that almost all of my eyeshadow had melted/dissolved away during the day. The crème texture that although very soft and smooth, would make applying my eyeliner difficult. I would end up having to use even more eyeliner, so my eyeliner wouldn't look muted. Although I wanted to love this eyeshadow set, I felt it fell a little short for it's price and prestige.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been loving this formula! This eyeshadow is creamy and blends really well. I find that less is more, and I love how easy I can create a quick look that looks great. My eye look lasted all day even without a primer. I find the colors pull more warm than what they appear in the pan. The packaging is luxurious and so pretty! I’m not sure if this quad is worth the price, but for an avid makeup user, it could be a nice splurge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite compacts. I have liked this and tend to use it more than any others in my makeup collection.  I like the consistency of this formula and the colors a lot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This little eyeshadow palette is so versatile. It can create soft, low-key looks for everyday wear or vivid looks for going out. Tom Ford does it right! So grateful I got to test this out free thanks to Influencer and Tom Ford! I will buy some once I’m out and I’ll be absolutely worth the price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely the most luxurious eyeshadow quad I’ve ever had. The packaging and the brushes, everything is luxe. The shades are lovely and can be worn day or night. The shimmer is finely milled and not heavy. I received this via INFLUENSTER for reviewing purposes. It’s on the pricey side, but nice if budget is no object.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Things I liked: the textured boxed packaging, simple yet luxurious looking. Magnet to open and close. Sleeve for the case to not get scratched/dirty. Several types of applicators. Nice pretty colors. Buildable and stayed on all day.  Things I didn’t like: case can get scratched easily if not taken care of (prob why there’s a sleeve?) Also left my finger prints and bothersome so had to clean each time I used it. Could be built to look darker or more pigmented which I prefer to have a strong pigment and go easy if need to not the other way around.  Tried without a base and didn’t really stay all day, got patchy and color was harder to show on my skin tone.   This is just unfortunately not in my budget and not as pigmented to my liking but it’s still a good product. I know my mom would love this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What a beautiful palette! Not only are these beautiful colors but the colors are rich in pigment. The perfect palette for a day to night look.

reviews.review_title: Shadow gorgeous, sponge brushes wasted space
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received from Influenster.  I found that the shadows in this compact were best as a day to day look.  There are 3 shimmer shades but they are all light/medium day colors.   None of the shades will work as a highlight if you have light or fair skin.  A person would need to be tan or darker to use even the lightest shade to highlight.   The sole matte is a brown that feels neutral to warm.  Honestly, it's one of very few high end small palettes that I feel have a brown that would not be ashey as a base color on darker skin as mini palettes tend towards a cool tone brown. (a.k.a. greyish).  I also respect that the brand decided to make a talc free formula and that it still blended beautifully.   Talc usually lowers the cost of ingredients significantly and makes things blendable but is regularly harvested near asbestos.   So the concern for health is admirable.  As for why I took off a star.  If this were an inexpensive product I probably wouldn't feel as annoid by the waste of space taken up by horrible little brushes.  I feel they wasted money on this pair of little disposable things.  I tried them just to be sure.  Yes, they work but do not lend themselves to easy cleaning, the size made them so difficult to hold, and application was a disservice to the quality of the shadows.   Rearranging the quad to be long to add one quality brush that a hand could hold would have been acceptable (think Urban Decay palettes).  Decreasing the packaging and ridding the brushes could have been lovely.   This would have made the compact smaller for carrying and the packaging is so rich that they could have made the same profit while lowering the cost due to more packaging and whatever the lousy brushes cost.  They did use the pretty packaging for the handles which are too short to hold. The shadows themselves are gorgeous and have quality ingredients that are valuable.  It's like having a 5 star restaurant serve dinner and give sporks to eat with

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this eyeshadow palette, and because of the price of one of these palettes, I had high hopes. Unfortunately, I was let down by the actual formula of the product. Let me start off with the good. I was impressed that it comes with a little carrying pouch for the pallette. The colors are very rich, buttery/creamy,  they were easy to blend together. I think the actual colors are good for a normal everyday day look.  Now for the not-so-good... Number one, the price! I can't justify spending $90 on a product that is just subpar. You definitely need to apply an eyeshadow primer if you're looking for this product to last you all day or night because without one these colors don't seem to last more than a couple of hours. Also, something else that isn't a huge issue but the case that the pallette is in, shows fingerprints very well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary for my honest review. I loved the packaging. It comes with its own protective cloth bag. The color payoff is rich. Creamy. Subtle. The color stays bold and doesn’t fade. Doesn’t crease. I love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was a beautiful product, from the packaging to the shadows themselves. While I appreciate the effort to include a brush (and not just the normal makeup sponge) the brush was just too small to get any grip or be able to blend. Maybe a brush that can fold and then expand? It was just not usable and my hands are pretty small. Other than that, this blended well, the pigment was good and the palette was beautiful and a good weight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found this pallette to be luxurious and very pretty.  The packaging was beautiful.  You don't often see the brushes and applicators anymore and that gave it a bit of a vintage feel for me.  I found the color payoff to be what is expected for neutral tones.  I didn't notice much fallout.   I like it for travel where I know I won't be wearing a lot of makeup but want to have that no makeup look with the ability to go a little smoky

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Long-lasting, does not smudge after at least 24 hours of wear (I work 24-he shifts). Besides, I enjoy the brushes that came with the set, which is a quite unusual experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a big fan of creme eye shadow, and this one does not disappoint! The pigment tones work well on my fair skin, and are great for a night out. I personally use matte eye shadows for work, and shimmer at night or on the weekends. Eyeshadow primer does still make a difference in staying power if you'll be out and about for a number of hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford is my favorite brand.  Tiger eye eye shadow quad is a sophisticated, classy glam eye shadow palette that makes my eyes look beautiful.  The collection of shimmery and matte shadows makes it stand out. I love the colors and how they accentuate my look.  Have already recommended to a lot people.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to receive this palette for free for my honest opinion. I could never convince myself to to spend this much on four shades. The colors I received were stunning! They glide on so effortlessly and blend like a dream. They are all satin/shimmer finish and give this beautiful glow to the eyes, almost like a “wet look”.  My one complaint would be that is like at least one matte shade. All in all, I want to try more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this quad eyeshadow palette. The packaging feels very luxurious and the shadows are great. I use these on an everyday basis and love the natural look. Pigments are easy to work with I Highly recommend this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very beautiful quad, not unique in the color story but the cream powder formula is very nice. I do recommend using an eyeshadow primer or else there may be significant creasing. This effortlessly creates beautiful and classy eye looks that are great for everyday wear. The shadows have a decent amount of pigment considering the cream formula but they also blend out so easily and can create nice sheer looks as well. It actually shows up on my deeper skin tone which is nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using it, trying to get a feel for the palette and I would give it 5 stars for packaging, how luxe it is, and how creamy the product is! I took off a star though for the pigmentation/how it shows up on my light medium skin tone and how expensive it is!   I wouldn’t buy it for myself per se, but I would 100% get it as a fabulous gift for someone with lighter skin tone. The packaging really is fabulous and beautiful and SO LUXURIOUS!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The quality of this eyeshadow is unmatched by all the many others I own & have tried. I have used this exclusively since I received it as a free sample over a month ago. It takes me literally 2 mins to make any kind of look I want & my eyes look like a makeup artist did them. It truly is worth the money & It’s the perfect size with GORGEOUS packaging. I can’t believe I spent so much money on huge palettes when this is really all I need.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received as an incentive program. I enjoyed using this eye shadow. It went on very easily and stayed on all day. The colors were very natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eye shadow so much. It blends so well and the color lasts all day. If this tells you how great it is… I went to a music festival and wore this in 85 degree weather and it didn’t budge with me sweating and living my best life. These are great every day colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What a great foursome of neutrals! This creates a beautiful look with little effort, as the colors are so smooth. It’s a little much for my every day, but it definitely makes a statement.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Looks and feel of this packaging are 5 stars. Colors are pretty and they go on smooth but so do a lot of other eyeshadows that are much more cost effective. If your goal is to show off how much money you have then this quad is for you. If you actually like makeup, then spend your $90 on a palette with the same quality and many more eyeshadows to choose from.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: In love with this palette! The shades compliment my dark brown eyes perfectly and are a subtle but elegant addition to any look. Long-lasting, easy to blend, love love love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is amazing! It feels creamy and goes on smooth. The pigmentation in them is great. I did not need to use a lot of product. The packaging is beautiful. I feel like I could throw this in my bag on the go and not have worry about the shadows breaking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this eyeshadow palette via influenster! The eyeshadow is very buttery and velvety. Extremely easy to blend except for the taupe (was too bad but in comparison with the other three, it seemed to need more blending). Color selection in the quad all work together. I do wish for maybe a different shade or variation. This palette is perfect for work for me. I think someone who likes a tried and true routine/straightforward/classic look would really enjoy this quad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First of all I absolutely love the packaging. It feels rich and luxurious right out of the box, but the product itself is pretty lackluster.  The “brushes” should have just been left out entirely. They are horrible and you’re better off using your own brushes or if you’re truly in a pinch use your fingers. The colors are gorgeous and they glide on so nicely, but they don’t last long on my oily skin. I have tried multiple primers and nothing will last the whole day like other palettes I have. I wish the colors were a bit more dimensional on my skin, but they don’t have a big difference between them except for the darkest brown that’s included. I love the neutral Smokey look you can create, but I wish it lasted longer. Overall I think it’s a beautiful quad, but I would not purchase it for the price that it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This quad has become my go to for the no makeup, makeup look. So creamy and yummy. No fall out. It applies with no problem. The color payoff is great. The packaging is luxe and screams expensive. I used a brush and my finger to apply. Stunning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful shades of neutral colors, went on great with my skin. Very smooth and sexy. I wore on a few nights out with the hubby and he complimented me on my eyes every time I wore it. Definitely recommend, great brand with high quality eyeshadows.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Creamy warm eyeshadow. Love that it is a buildable eyeshadow. The colors are so shimmery and comes on so smoothly. This palette is perfect for me since I like neutral and low key, but can go glam as well. The packaging is beautiful and luxe. I would use your favorite eyeshadow brush…the ones it comes with does not really do the eyeshadow justice when you apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product!!!! It went on smoothly lasted all day with my eyeshadow primer. The colors were great for every day use which is my favorite part!! The pigments perfect for the colors it’s not to much. The price of this product is the only bad thing it’s not affordable it’s very pricey!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Glides on so smooth. Doesn't cake. Blends easily. Beautiful and vibrant. Really makes the eyes pop.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't think this quad is worth the price. Yes it's a high end brand, so you get great quality packaging and excellent color pay-off. It's the colors that don't offer much to me. Almost $90 for 4 small eyeshadow, seems too much. None of them are matte, all the colors have some shimmer and the champagne color has some gold particles that I wasn't happy with. I wouldn't recommend it, you can use your money to buy a much bigger palette with more variety of colors, and still get the quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this eye-shadow palette! I like the metallic eye-look. It was very creamy it, was buildable and I know a lot of people complain about the pigment. But the results depend on how you apply it, and the brushes you use. The effectiveness of the eyeshadow was superb! This was just what I was looking for! And it could be used for daytime and nighttime! I recommend!  *received complementary

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t love or hate this product. Packaging is absolutely gorgeous although I don’t need the little applicators that came with it. The colors are gorgeous but don’t have the most pigment right off the bat. You do have to build up and it’s more of a natural look. I do have to say I didn’t use an eye primer so for me they weren’t that long lasting, although I do have oily lids. I have to try with an eye primer and see if that’ll make the color last. I just can’t justify the price on this. It’s just meh. This product was sent to me for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colors in the Tiger Eye palette are beautiful. Just the right amount of pigment, pigmented but also buildable—if that makes sense. The packaging is beautiful and very luxurious, I loved the little pouch that is included. I swatched all 4 colors on my arm and all 4 wiped off nicely with a make up eraser. The shadow hold throughout the day and again came off easily at the end of the day. I do feel that this palette is slightly overpriced. I don’t know that I would recommend it at this price point. I’ve used plenty of other comparable products at much better price points. BUT if cost isn’t a factor, than the Tiger Eye palette is a great palette!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this eyeshadow quad. The neutrals are easy to wear on the eyes daily and the colors are super rich and pigmented with a buttery feel. I love the hint of shimmer in the colors too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford’s wet/dry eyeshadow formula has been a long time favorite of mine, but I may have found another favorite after trying this palette. The shadows are soft and creamy to the touch. The formula is reminiscent of Natasha Denona’s cream to powder shadows. Like those, the Tom Ford shadows aren’t the easiest to pick up with a brush, yet this could be a positive in that you can build the pigment slowly instead of applying too much and struggle with blending. The shadows apply nicely with a finger as well. If you want to create a one shadow look, you can apply the shadow with your finger, and blend out the edges with a brush. It’s so easy to use, for beginners and pros alike. Because these eyeshadows have such a creamy texture, they look almost like they are a part of your skin. They lay so beautifully, and never look dry. The tones of the Tiger Eye quad are absolutely stunning, however I would have loved to have one more shadow as a lighter matte transition shade instead of the three shimmers. Overall, excellent formula, and I can’t wait to try out more color stories. This product was received complimentary from Influenster for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this pallet. The shadows are creamy and pigmented enough to where I just need a bit. I wouldn’t recommend this as an everyday pallet since there isn’t any mattes just creamy shimmers, however I do like using this for when I’m in a hurry. A quick swipe with a finger and then straight to the lid is how I like to apply these. It comes with two brushes but I feel like my method is quickest and gives me the pigment I like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm thrilled to have been provided Tom Ford's Eye Color Quad Creme in Tiger Eye by Influenster in exchange for my honest review. This magnetic compact has a mirror and comes with a travel pouch and 2 double tipped high quality applicators in multiple shapes, one being a brush. The eye palette is in 4 complimentary shades (4 different finishes are sheer sparkle, satin, shimmer, and matte) that seem like they would be good with most skin and hair types and offer a variety of intensity/effects. I used this without a primer and felt like this was easy to apply, blended well, and stayed on all day without settling into creases. The intensity lessened a bit by the end of the day but it was still pretty. I thought this preformed well and looked great, I would highly recommend trying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought the colors of this pallet were very beautiful. Each shade has a shimmer to it, I would prefer a couple shades without the sparkle though because I prefer a pallet that I can just grab and go on a trip. This one is compact enough to bring along however without having a solid shade I need an additional pallet with me. The eyeshadow formula feels very soft and buttery to me. It does stay on long enough for me however some people may prefer a shadow that lasts longer..mind you I did not wear a primer when I wore this do that may have made a difference. Overall a nice small pallette, the best thing going for it is the compact size, the texture, and the colors. I wasn't a fan of the brushes they came with or that their wasn't any solid colors for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous and well worth the investment. Tom Ford doesn’t miss the mark on this one. From the compact to the protector sleeve, you know that you have made an excellent choice. Highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_title: Lots of fallout & not a lot of saturation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for free from Influenster and actually didn’t realize what these colors were until just now, it would be helpful for more info about that on the packaging. I thought they were going to more neutral looking at them in the pallet but they turned out more red toned on my skin which leaves me looking like I’ve been rubbing my eyes but now it makes sense reading the color descriptions. If you like the more red tones & brown then this is a good option. It had a lot of fallout though & not a lot of saturation even using that little applicator. I just don’t think it’s any better then other pallets I have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Never disappointed with Tom Ford, the packaging always looks very nice, the mini brushes that come with it are also good quality. The product is very creamy and blends nicely. The color pigment comes off as expected and how it looks in the pan.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful palette, perfect for smoky eye
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to be gifted this by Influenster and Tom Ford in exchange for my honest review because I am a huge fan of Tom Ford products. This palette didn’t disappoint me whatsoever. The packaging is beautiful and sleek, and I love that it comes with a velvet bag to keep the palette safe. It comes with a gorgeous mirror and little brushes that makes this perfect for travel.   These shadows are amazing. They are very pigmented but at the same time not too harsh where you can build up the color to where you want it. The formula is so soft, buttery, and smooth with each shade having a shimmer to it without the chunky glitter feeling. All the colors blend so easily and effortlessly. The only thing I wish is that there was one transition matte shade in this palette for transition work but otherwise I love this little palette.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First the texture is amazing. It is creamy, which means eyeshadow won’t be loose and dusting all over the place. Which draws me to the second point, it blends perfectly! In less than ten minutes I was able to create a perfect daytime look that lasted through the night.  It comes with a brush applicator/eyeshadow applicator that is sturdy. As a beginner with make-up it made my life easier and more confident when applying this eyeshadow. Third, a little goes a long way!  One dab of each color for a light look. Two dabs for a little more of a dramatic look, which is perfect for date night. Will definitely be purchasing the rose palette when it becomes available.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: From the moment I got the Tom Ford Eye Color it in my hands I felt this was truly a luxury item. The colors in the pallet are rich and beautiful. Lots of shimmer in 3 of the colors. The deep brown color is matt. This pallet should be plenty to serve for everything ranging from everyday makeup to something for special occasions. The package is great item for traveling. While the product does include applicators, I would recommend using a different one. The included applicators are usable, but you can achieve much better results if you use specialized eyeshadow brushes. Personally, I have problems with eyeshadow in general as it does not last. However, this product surprised me. Using just a little bit of transparent setting powder over this eyeshadow actually lasts! The product is quite pricey, but if you do decide to invest, I feel you will get a good quality product which will last. For this, I would totally recommend the Tom Ford Eye Color Cream eyeshadow quad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Enjoyed this palette. Includes the perfect everyday tones. Deep brown hue for a super sultry smoky eye! The shadows blend beautifully! Very creamy feel with just enough shimmer for a elevated look. Comfortable wear that is moderate on longevity. Very much enjoyed dampening the brush just a smidge to intensify shimmer. 5/5!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Shades are all neutral so it is easy to get a natural look. You can also make a smokey eye. The entire palette is shimmer/satin. So I do wish that there was at least one matte shade. However, that did not deter me from using this by itself or with other shadows. As for the brush/sponges that come with this set, I could live without them. Packaging is beautiful but there is no need for a dust cover.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Great natural everyday pallet! These colors are great and the pallet is the perfect size to take with me to travel!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this palette. The colors are easy to blend and do not require a lot to build up the depth. It’s a great palette for simple every day eye looks. I receive this palette complimentary from Influenster and these opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are such pretty colors. They’re all soft and blend easily. You can use them just by themselves or use them as base for other looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super smooth application and beautiful pigments! The packaging and presentation is nice as well! Looking forward to wearing these colors this summer! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so impressed with this Tom Ford eyeshadow quad! I’m an eyeshadow junkie. I usually buy most of the new pallets that are put out by Sephora, etc,  I’m also in love with most luxury beauty items. This did not disappoint! There is hardly any fallout, the colors are very pigmented and the blend like a dream! I will be back to buy other colors!  I received this item free from Influenster, but my opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Presentation is stunning, such high quality! The applicators are lacking. The colors are beautifully pigmented and go on smooth. No caking, lasted for hours with my hooded eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very lux product!  I love everything about the shadow!  It blends beautifully and is buildable so you can have a more natural look or build it up for a more dramatic eye!  I found that using a dense brush worked best for the consistency I was going for because my fluffy brush was too natural for what I was wanting.  Even unboxing was a lux experience, they have amazing packaging and the palette came in a cloth bag!  Love!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked how the four shades of the Tiger Eye palette really complimented each other and made it super easy to do a Smokey eye look. Even better than the darkest shade was a matte finish. I do wish there was another matte in the palette but not a deal breaker. The burnt coral shade didn’t look as pinky-red on the eye as it does in the pan but otherwise perform beautifully. I’ll definitely be reaching for it again. The packaging itself is super lux. The palette has some weight and it comes with a soft suede like pouch to protect it. The mirror inside is large enough to be useful. I most likely wouldn’t purchases this for myself because of the price tag, but if you can swing it and wanna treat yourself, go for it the quality is there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is very nice. The colors show up nicely on my eyes and blend well together. However, one color comes off lighter than it appears in the pan. I do feel like it's better to apply with a fluffy brush instead of a flat brush. When you use a flat brush the eyeshadow looks like it has hard pan or some powder layer? It says creme but doesn't feel or act like one. Hopefully the product will stay this nice with extended use. Overall the palette is lovely,  but I can not justify the price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster and to leave and honest feedback. I was beyond excited to try this product! The packaging is OK a little confusing with no clans or button do you have to physically lift to open compact, the colors are beautiful and Versatile from every day looks, to Smokey eyes/drama. Some negatives: the formula is very dry so it takes extra product to build to make visible. The applicators/brush it came with are cheap and I feel, lessen a high end product. For the cost I really feel this could be leveled up with a better formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really happy to get this specific color range (tiger eye) as the shades are very pretty. I found that blended well on me and looked nice on my skin (very fair). Packaging is also really nice and sturdy. My only concern is price. I feel like the market has a lot of similar product that is just as quality for much less…so, minus a star for that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This quad is so blendable and gorgeous! I don’t use a lot of makeup, so the ease of four colors made it awesome and they look stunning together. The consistency is very light and the colors and nicely pigmented. So flattering and a new favorite!

reviews.review_title: Beautiful Colors! Not so great formula.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is pretty and the colors are beautiful! However the blind ability of the product is not easy and very dusty! I tried a few different looks with this and the best one is a lighter daytime look. You can get some very pretty looks, but expect a lot of clean up. For the price, more time should be spent on the product itself and less on the packaging.   Thank you Influenster for allowing me to review this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye shadow quad came in a very beautiful and luxe packaging; I had high expectations for this product. However the eyeshadows are not that pigmented and didn’t think of this as a creme shadow. The colors are dreamy. This quad can be used for a day look and build the eyeshadow for a more dramatic night look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product to try for review from Influenster and Tom Ford. Initial impressions of the packaging was that it was beautifully and elegantly packaged. I was excited to try this product as I have been looking for more eyeshadow shades to add to my summer collection and the tiger eye shades did not disappoint. I tend to lean more towards golden tones and loved the pigment of these shades. I used the applicator that comes with the quad and found it distributed the product and pigments very evenly. I loved the gold tone shade for an all over color and decided to use the darker brown tone as a liner. Overall, I felt the product had great pigments and love these colors as staples to add to my summer collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by mentioning that I got this product free from Influenster and Tom Ford in exchange for my honest opinion. I was super shocked to be getting this but super happy. When I opened the box, it was the most lux experience I’ve had opening an eyeshadow quad. When I opened the quad, I was super happy to see what a beautiful color story I had received. I swatched the colors and they where okay. Guys, I really did try to love this palette, I really did but it’s really not my favorite. I like two out of the four colors in there. The dark brown is beautiful and I can use it to line my eyes. The rest are shimmers but they are not very easy to get right. You really have to work at and they don’t seem to stay pretty. I have low end palettes to perform better than this. This palette has made it into the back of my eye shadow drawer.
