I’ve played with it for a few weeks now to only grow more disappointed at how it performs. If you are looking at the palette, proceed with caution. Go for a Huda palette instead!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These shadows have the best quality, being soft and buttery, with high pigmentation and easy blending. The pans are all pretty huge, so you're still getting a ton of product despite the smaller number of shadows. Each color only really needs a tap for full coverage, but if you want you can definitely build up for a more intense look by using more. The colors included work so well together, and one of my favorite aspects of this palette, though, is that one of the colors can be used as highlighters. I do love me some multi-functionality!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye shadow pallet is so creamy and pigmented. I have hazel eye color and these colors help my eyes pop! I am by no means a professional when it comes to applying my makeup but this pallet makes it so easy! I can do a nice smoky look and the colors match with just about every outfit I have. The fine glitter makes the colors stand out. There is some fall out when applying, so make sure to do your eyes first.  After a long day full of activities,  I checked out my eyes and I couldn't believe it, there was no creasing and it didn't budge! It still looked just as gorgeous as when I first applied it. I will definitely be purchasing more pallets! Just wish it was more affordable so I'd be able to have and use more Tom Ford products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye shadow palette has nice packing which gives me a touch of luxury. It even has a pouch. The color contains refined particles and give shimmering finish. The color is good for daily use. subtle and not dramatic. I like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice buttery eyeshadow quad. It’s perfect for everyday wear as it’s not very pigmented. It’s user friendly and fool proof - you will not look crazy if you take only a second to apply eyeshadow in the morning before work. The eyeshadow lasts all day on me without creasing. Very beautiful, sparkly and easy to work with. The packaging is gorgeous! Large high quality mirror.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It always feels like the more high end fashion brands don't do eyeshadow that well. But Tom Ford stands out amount those in an attempt to change the game. The regular quad by them are beautiful but this creme formula is amazing. I love how smooth they apply and last all day. I received mine free from Influenster for my review but even without that I'd have bought one for my collection. The only thing I don't love is just the small down grades from the regular quads, like not even embossed pans. I'm paying for those details.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this eyeshadow pallette! I tried out the Tiger Eye shades. I cannot give this enough compliments. Its definitely long wearing, blended well and is gorgeous on. My new favorite shade is the burnt coral.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this eyeshadow to review and it is lovely.  The formula is very buttery smooth but it’s not the most pigmented. It’s good for a nice wash of color on the lid but it’s going to need to be built up for more pigment. If I wasn’t careful, the shade would blend almost completely away. I’m very fair skinned and it wasn’t that pigmented so I would be weary if you have medium to deeper skin. The packaging was just perfect; beautifully luxurious and heavy. I have started using it as the main mirror for doing my makeup because it feels so nice. Overall, it’s nice but I’d be careful with blending it away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really beautiful product from start to finish. The packaging is thoughtful - complete with a duster bag for the compact. It's beautifully pigmented and creamy and doesn't require you to layer it on. The shimmer is light and beautiful. Truly a shimmer and not a sparkle. Just enough to draw attention to your eyes. Really worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Cute and sleekpackaging.The colors are brownish to peachy nudes.perfect shimmer not too much and not too little.The product glides smoothly on the eye area without a powdery feel which is nice and the colors compliment warm skin tones. Perfect for everyday as well as a party look.Wish it came with a primer too for the price but overall satisfied with the quality of the product.Tomford has done a good job on this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This color set is amazing. The eye shadows are full of pigment go on very smooth and don't crease over time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The packing is elegant, eye catching and beautiful, but the star is the quad of course! The coverage is amazing and the colors are so unique. They work together beautifully to create the perfect smokey look, or a bright, shimmery daytime glow. It comes with two dual ended sponge/brush applicators. It's great to have the option of either right in the compact. My favorite feature is just how shimmery yet deep the colors are. Absolutely love this classy little palate!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this eyeshadow palette. I love the natural colors in this. I was able to create pretty looks without a doubt. I love how luxurious it looks and feels. The dust bag is super convenient to protect it when I take it on the go. I recommend this to anyone that has any doubt purchasing this because of the price. I think it’s worth it 100%.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford never disappoints!! The eyeshadow is creamy and glides on really nicely. It feels pretty luxurious and doesn’t have any fallout. What’s interesting is that it’s not super pigmented even though it’s a luxury palette - I actually like it because it’s a more natural and neutral palette. The packaging is also really nice and luxurious! Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you want a subtle shimmer then this is for you! I liked that it was not too glittery but just right. You may be able to build it up by wetting it, but it will probably be more subtle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Received from Influencer. This is a beautiful quad. Colors are pigmented. Blends easily. All 4 colors go great together.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way for the day. I don’t wear a lot so heavy pigmentation is not a must for me. This goes on smoothly and doesn’t powder up regardless of which side of the brush that you use. I love how soft the brush is and this is perfect for my upcoming travel. No need to bring a normal sized brush with me when I go out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful case and velvet bag, I tried them with and without primer, I really liked the shade and the pigmentation both ways, creamy so easy to apply and without any uneven look, stayed all day even cleaned just with water and did loose a little color but you can still say it was on, easy to remove too. Giving 4 stars just because I do think is high on the price range since I have tried similar effects on a cheaper brands

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eyeshadow! Goes on so smooth and is very pigmented. Beautiful colors!. The packaging was very nice as well. The only reason I didn’t give this product 5 stars is because of the price. VERY expensive!.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a luxury to have. It feels luxurious, the packaging is beautiful, it has a suede cover to protect the case, the colors are beautiful, the shadows feel very creamy, I loved the selection of colors

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product to try and review through Influenster.    I loved this eyeshadow quad. It, to me, was very pigmented and, as I tend to wear light eye makeup, had to blend it out more than I usually would. In my opinion,  as much as I don't typically spend so much on myself,  I do think this is worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love these colors, so easily blendable and versatile. The packaging is very luxe and TF worthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in exchange for my honest review. This is a good everyday pallet. The matte shades are so creamy and the shimmers are beautiful! I’m not the biggest fan of the small brushes but If you are using it for travel it’s good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's packaging is the best part of the product. There is fall out. The eye shadow is not pigmented at all. It looks really pretty in the packaging, but doesn't apply well AT ALL! I'm very disappointed even more once I seen the price of this eye shadow palette.  I've had better shadows for more a portion of this price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a perfect palate that you can use for every day or a more dramatic look. Tom Ford never fails to deliver on quality and the color deposit is very rich, and there is barely any fallout!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not a bad palette but totally not worth $80+ in my opinion. There's nothing that makes this palette extraordinary even though this is marketed as cream eyeshadow. ColourPop makes 'cream' eyeshows at a fraction of the price and they pack more of a punch. Overall a nice palette but I would not have purchased for myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye shadow quad is so gorgeous and luxurious I was extremely excited to try they are so smooth like butter and super pigmented with no fall out the packaging has a heavy weight to it ladies and gents it’s overpriced for a quad but if you love luxurious items and packaging it’s definitely worth the splurge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first Tom Ford quad. It’s really nice. The shadows are creamy and really smooth. They glide on nicely with a brush or finger tip. I didn’t experience any creasing while wearing though I do use primer. They aren’t the most pigmented eyeshadows out there so if you’re looking for indie level pigment look elsewhere, but if you want nice smooth eyeshadow that lasts then this might be for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This quad is absolutely gorgeous. I love how all four shades complimented each other to create an easy natural look. Even though the packaging felt luxurious, I don’t think it’s worth it’s steep price.  I still will use this for special occasions.  I received this Tom ford quad from influenster in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for testing purposes and my honest review. If I had lots of money, I would buy more in different colors. This product glides on smoothly and is easy to blend. I found myself wearing everyday and is great for work. Little to no fallout. It’s a must try if you can splurge!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was BEYOND excited to open this complimentary product to review. From the moment I saw the packaging it just screamed luxury. The eyeshadow is very pigmented and beautiful for everyday wear or to use the shimmer shades for a special event. Either way I’m hooked!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford never disappoints. The quality of this eyeshadow quad is beautiful. The packaging is so luxurious &fancy. The product itself blended with ease &was very pigmented. I got the quad in Tiger eye &the shades were perfect for an earthy smokey eye. The shades complimented my eyes beautifully. So worth the price !! 10 out of 10 from me ♥️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my gosh, okay, I’ve been so hyped to review this ever since it came in. I LOVE Tom Ford and I couldn’t believe I had snagged one of these palettes!   I received it in the color Tiger Eye, which featured champagne, browns and coral tones.   For starters, I’m so impressed by the applicators — the quality was superb and they allowed me to blend sooo well. I could easily see myself using them to apply this on the go if necessary! They’re double sided and come with appropriately shaped brush ends.   Side note, the packaging…the case, it all feels so LUXE. I feel like I’m holding a well made palette in my hand.   The case has a huge mirror on the inside and snaps shut softly. I have no worries when carrying this in my purse that it might open & sprinkle shadows everywhere.   The shadow colors were fantastic, I thoroughly enjoyed every look I created with this palette & found more than enough use out of both daytime and nighttime looks.  I am absolutely obsessed and look forward to using it more and more.   I have high expectations for anything Tom Ford and he hit the nail on the head with these!   Strongly recommend to anyone!  Super thankful for the opportunity to comment on this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a great color scheme. I find myself using it pretty regularly. The only thing I didn’t really like about it was the brushes. So I find myself using my own tall brushes and it still looks great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t usually wear eyeshadow—especially because it creases and turns into a mess after a while. This eyeshadow had great staying powder and the pigment was strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely obsessed with this eyeshadow palette! This colors are stunning and they are super blend able. I have super sensitive eyes and they were not irritated at all. I highly recommend this eyeshadow palette!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this eyeshadow palette complimentary from Influenster for an honest review.  * I loved how easily these shades blended and how cohesive the color story was. The colors are not anything earthshatering, but it was a well balanced neutral palette. * The packaging matched the price point. It feels very sleek and luxurious. I don't like the included foam applicators as they seem to be a waste and easily fall out with use.   Overall I really enjoyed this product and am happy to add it to my arsenal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this product complimentary from influenster for my honest review. I love this eye shadow on my skin and the packaging was gorgeous. The only complaint is that the brushes included were disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this from Influenster to trial and I had tried it once so far, besides swatches. I tried three of the shades, applied with my finger because the included brushes aren’t what look like luxury quality. I had to run off to work out and did a very sweaty routine, but my eyeshadow held up fine. Note that I wasn’t having an oily lid day, these didn’t feel overly creamy either? I’m not sure how they’d hold up on a day where my lids were oily. Probably have to powder them and fingers crossed first. Would I repurchase a $90 quad? No, because I’m a mom of three and I can’t see spending that kind of money on four eyeshadows. They’re pretty, granted, but I have plenty of pallets of shades in these colors, it’s a good product no matter. These opinions are mine, but I was given this product for free to try out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is not a palette I would personally buy myself all the colors are pretty much the same they don't stand out this is not palette going forward I'm going to gravitate towards quality wise it's not bad it's pigmented easy to blend creamy if your a neutral person it's not a bad buy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: To start the colors were beautiful in Tiger Eye! I love wearing neutrals to enhance my eyes! It will definitely be in my rotation. The colors applied smoothly and can build up for a more dramatic night time look. I would highly recommend this line from Tom Ford!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Tom Ford for my honest opinion and review.   Gorgeous long lasting eye shadow colors. The case has a weighted luxurious packaging. Could go without the mini applicators as it diminishes the luxury feel of the pallet.   Would recommend for the pigment of the colors and for how well they stay throughout the day.

reviews.review_title: Drying and much pinker than it seems
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sk excited to finally get my hands on one of these, but I was really let down. The formula feels lovely but really accentuates any fine lines/eye wrinkles. I  do not recommend this shade for my fellow light skinned warm undertoned humans. It really looks like redness rather than a nice natural color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great color pay off, and smooth blending. Definitely enjoy the neutral palette.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a fan of Tom Ford Beauty, the shades in this palettes did not diss appoint, however, the pigment was not as rich as expected. Layered over a primer and/or a base it seemed to pull more true to shade, of course. Beautiful for a softer, sheer shade with the exception of the deep, chocolate brown. A decent palette with high shimmer factor.

reviews.review_title: I wanted to like this more
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited about this, but honestly my colourpop palettes have a better formula. It's not bad at all, just not impressive. It looks gorgeous when first applied, but it wears off so quickly, even after testing it with multiple bases. If you want something subtle, this is a good option though. I did receive this free to review, but this is my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free for review! I absolutely love it!! The colors are very pigmented and look so pretty! The packaging was also super cute. I’d definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tom Ford did it again. This eyeshadow quad is beautiful, blend well and last all day. Goes on silky smooth and it can be used all season which is a plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this beautiful eyeshadow quad as a complimentary and I’m in love!! Such an amazing colors combo! The quality is on another lever, beautiful color combination

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Tom Ford's Tiger Eye Quad from Influenster for my honest review.  The packaging is very expensive looking, with the leather cover over the quad and a nice mirror attached with engraving on the mirror.  The colors are in very neutral shades, the colors are a bit sheer with a shimmer finsh. the formula is very smooth to apply on the lids. They blend really well. There is a little bit of fall out and it creases and fades after a couple hours. The applicators make it feel a bit cheap. When its a very pricy quad. Gives a nice natural look ,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the colors in this quad. They all go together very well and you can create multiple eye looks with these 4 shades. Texture was nice and soft, nothing chalky. I did expect them to be longer lasting given the price point. You need a primer 100%.   The packaging also felt a little cheap. I would have preferred something a bit sturdier.   Overall, while I am happy to have it in my collection, I wouldn’t say it’s a MUST BUY.  I did receive this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful colors, amazing pigment and stay! I love how versatile the colors are and the best part is there is no fall out! The powder itself is like a creamy consistency and just goes on so smooth. I received this this product as a free sample

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is super lux - came with a sachet. On my olive complexion, the bottom two shades were opaque and worked with my skin tone. The top two were on the sheer side

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To preface, I received this quad complimentary via Influenster. As per my expectations, this eye quad performed beautifully. The matte was pigmented (almost too much??? You need to go in suuuper lightly), blended well, and the shimmers were buttery.    That being said, I would have expected out of this world quality for an $89 eyeshadow quad. I have zero qualms dropping $$$ on beauty, but when I can purchase a Pat McGrath palette with 10 PHENOMENAL shadows for $128, this just doesn’t seem worth it - $22.25/shadow vs $12.80/shadow.   I will say that the packaging is gorgeous, but it includes a mirror, which is unnecessary and ultimately landfill bound as mirror glass is not recyclable. It also has those tragic tiny mini sponge applicators, which though I guess theoretically useful? Just seem like a waste, since I still used a regular crease brush for the matte shade and applied the shimmers with my fingers as usual.   Unless you’re obsessed with designer makeup and/or a tots packaging ho, your $$$ is better spent elsewhere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The pigment is amazing but it still looks natural and fresh. All colors are warm/neutral and have a light/radiant shimmer to it.  The darker shade is more of a semi-matte. I have brown eyes and these colors worked really well! This is definitely worth the splurge!

reviews.review_title: Not the best for the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received it theough Influenster, To me it doesn't quite live up to the price tag.  It's super smooth but doesn't have a ton of color pay off. What color does show up blends well. But wouldnt soend the money on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this palette complimentary from Influenster to review.   There’s definitely a market for a small luxurious eyeshadow palette, but it’s one I don’t fall into. That isn’t to say it isn’t gorgeous or even worth looking at, but for a high price point, I have certain expectations that weren’t met.   The quad is strictly shimmers only, no mattes, so it’s great for a quick and easy top coat over your base or a nice glittery eye look that’s simultaneously muted and understated. And the colors are quite pretty, beautifully complementing one another for a simple nude brown look.  I did encounter a bit of difficulty with the red shade. It was the messiest of the bunch with a considerable amount of fall out in the pan. Red glitter littered the top of the packaging.   Overall, I recommend for a makeup lover that loves for luxury brands and won’t mind spending a pretty penny on 4 shimmer shadows. But for those of us needing a bit more out of our palettes, I’d say it’s a solid skip and admire from afar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was actually really surprised by this quad. The colors were pretty and transferred beautifully to the eyelid. They blended easily and didn’t have a lot of fall out. You can make a more subdued look as well as a glamorous look with these colors. The champagne color works great as a highlighter too. I used this palette for the first time while doing my make up for a wedding party and it turned out great plus it stayed put for the whole night (& night) Loving this quad so far

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love love it. So smooth and creamy, the shimmer isn’t over the top, and the colors have great pigment. It’s a dream to slide across the eyelid, and the colors are perfect complements. Also, that packaging is so cute and classy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Anyone else having major hard pan issues?? I swatched it with clean hands, used it twice and already the lightest shade has hard panned quite a bit. I used tape to remove it and now the shade looks completely ruined. Disappointed for the price. Might try to exchange as I've heard some hard pan and some don't depending on the batch. I love the shades, so this sucks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have quite a few Tom Ford quads, and this is the first to apply so easily and blend. I was truly amazed! I think I will order another! Obviously, you can buy less expensive makeup that works well or possibly better, but it’s Tom Ford…that’s what you’re paying for lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Stunning. These colors pair so well together. Not to mention, the formula is divine, sitting somewhere between a powder and a cream. Silky, sheeny, satiny, creamy - amazing! I have other TF quads in different formulas and this is my favorite formula hands down. Quickly has become one of my favorite palettes period. Sometimes I feel it can be hard to get a complete eye look with a palette that only has 4 shades; with my other quads I find I'm reaching for other palettes to combine. BUT not with this one! I feel I can get a beautiful and complete look and that these shades really work well together. If you love TF, buy it! Can't wait to get my hands on the Smoky Quartz one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is soft and blendable. The color comes off very cool (not neutral as the description says) - the darkest color looks almost bluish on my fair skin. The silver sparkle doesn't have a lot of impact. Overall, this is a nice palette, but not worth the extremely high price. And I have better eyeshadows from other brands for a lot less money.
